title: Smartphone penetration as share of connections in Pakistan 2014 to 2020
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Percentage of connections, containing a total of 7 data points.
In general Percentage of connections has rose over the Year.
Percentage of connections is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2018, and lastly roughly constant from 2018 to 2020.
The highest Percentage of connections, of value 51.0 was reached at Year 2020
Minimum Percentage of connections about 10.0 was reached at Year 2014
